# RPScreenRecorder

**Class**

The shared recorder object that provides the ability to record audio and video of your app.

## Declaration

```swift
class RPScreenRecorder
```

## Overview

Apps on a user’s device can share the recording function, with each app having its own instance of  `RPScreenRecorder`. Your app can record the audio and video inside of the app, along with user commentary through the microphone. You get a reference to the recorder through the [doc://com.apple.replaykit/documentation/ReplayKit/RPScreenRecorder/shared()] function and use it to implement start-and-stop recording functionality. You can present a user interface (view controller) where a user can trim and preview recordings, and share them with other users. Only one app at a time can use the recorder on the user’s device. Your app can’t record video from [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayer].

## Accessing the Shared Recorder

- **shared()**: Returns an app’s instance of the shared screen recorder.

## Inspecting a Screen Recorder

- **isAvailable**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the screen recorder is available for recording.
- **isRecording**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the app is currently recording.
- **isMicrophoneEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the microphone is currently enabled.
- **isCameraEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the camera is currently enabled.
- **cameraPreviewView**: A view containing the contents of the front-facing camera.
- **cameraPosition**: The camera position to use.
- **RPCameraPosition**: The position of the camera being accessed.
- **delegate**: The delegate for the screen recorder.
- **RPScreenRecorderDelegate**: The protocol you implement to receive notifications from the screen recorder.

## Controlling App Recording

- **startRecording(handler:)**: Starts recording the app display.
- **stopRecording(handler:)**: Stops the current recording.
- **stopRecording(withOutput:completionHandler:)**: Stops the current recording and writes the movie to the specified output URL.
- **startCapture(handler:completionHandler:)**: Starts screen and audio capture.
- **RPSampleBufferType**: The type of media clip sample being buffered.
- **stopCapture(handler:)**: Stops screen capture
- **discardRecording(handler:)**: Discards the current recording.
- **startRecording(withMicrophoneEnabled:handler:)**: Starts recording the app’s audio and video.

## Performing Clip Recording

- **startClipBuffering(completionHandler:)**: Starts buffering a clip recording.
- **stopClipBuffering(completionHandler:)**: Stops buffering a clip recording.
- **exportClip(to:duration:completionHandler:)**: Exports a clip recording to a file.

## Replay Sharing

- **Recording and Streaming Your macOS App**: Share screen recordings, or broadcast live audio and video of your app, by adding ReplayKit to your macOS apps and games.
- **RPPreviewViewController**: An object that displays a user interface where users preview and edit a screen recording that you create with ReplayKit.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
